newsitem.title: USA: Allstate expands urban homeowners insurance.
newsitem.headline: Allstate expands urban homeowners insurance.

text.p: The Allstate Insurance Co, the National Fair Housing Alliance, and the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development said Wednesday that they have resolved the fair housing administrative complaints filed by NFHA against Allstate.

As part of the agreement, Allstate said it has asked the NFHA to help expand its programs to promote insurance opportunities in all urban neighborhoods. NFHA will also consult with the company on sales training and testing for three years.
